lead_paragraph: Pitcher Carlos Silva’s $4.325 million option was exercised yesterday by the Minnesota Twins. Silva, a 27-year-old right-hander, was 11-15 this season with a 5.94 earned run average. Silva has a 42-32 career record in 92 starts.
